page.title: 05INDUSTRY ON E. BANK OF TAFF
page.content:
List of industries (contd)
{e) Welsh Glass Works This is the main offices of the Welsh Glass Works and Capital Windows. {f) Anchor Industrial Estate The tyre centre buys tyres from Michelins, Dunlop, Pirelli and others. {g) Capital Windows Their glass comes from Gremany, Belguim and Luxembourg. They supply glass to Bristol, West Midlands and all over Wales. {h) Wholesale Newsagents They supply newspapers, comics and magazines all over Cardiff and "The Valleys". {i) Alfred Cooks}- heavy industry.
